Notes.Text:
This update for openconnect fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2020-12105: Fixed the improper handling of negative return values from X509_check_ function calls that might have allowed MITM attacks (bsc#1170452).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: OpenConnect through 8.08 mishandles negative return values from X509_check_ function calls, which might assist attackers in performing man-in-the-middle attacks.
